caption.title: Dynamics of sum of squared deviations (SSD).
caption.p: The chart gives the posterior mean of SSD (solid blue line) and 95% credible bands (shaded blue area) in each year. The time horizons suggested in the previous study is labeled for reference: Two long-term division (Period 1 and 2) and four short-term episodes (Episode A, B, C, and D).
